title: Murder at the Thanksgiving Feast
description: A family reunion turns deadly on Thanksgiving night. Search through reports, interrogations, and hidden evidence to uncover who poisoned Arthur Holloway — and why.

title: The Silent Thanksgiving
description: A chilling Thanksgiving mystery set in a storm-battered mansion. Derek Harper is found dead in Room 3B at dawn — no struggle, no marks, only silence. Every family member hides something… but who turned that silence into murder?

title: The Last Note
description: Crack the case of a mysterious death using clues hidden in notes, files, and evidence.
